titleStmt.title: Taʾammǝra Māryām “Miracles of Mary” / Taʾammǝra Libānos “Miracles of Libānos”

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary:
I) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 4ra-9rb, 11ra-161rb) I-1) Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymn (fols. 4ra-9rb)
II) Taʾammǝra Libānos: 3 miracles (fols. 9va-10rb)
I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 11ra-13rb) I-3) ʾƎsaggǝd laki wa-ʾǝweddǝsaki... "I worship Thee..." (fols. 13rb-14rb) I-4a) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary": 1 miracle (fols. 14rb-15vb) I-4b) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary": 103 miracles (fols. 16ra-161rb) Additio 1.

supportDesc.extent: Made of 161.0 folios, of which 0.0 blank 1r-3r, 161vb, in 22.0 quires (A+21). 280 205 55

list.item: 8 VI(8/ s.l. 6 stub after 3; 3, stub after 6/fols. 40r-47v)
list.note: Quires I and II were added later.

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. is very worn. The back board is missing and replaced by a piece of cardboard. Traces of a leather cover are preserved on the inner side of the front board. The sewing ins badly damaged, crudely repaired. Many fols. are stained with wax and dirt. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 1, 2, 29, 41, 49, 58, 91, 100, 107, 125, 132, 133, 134, 141, 154, 155, 156. Holes on fols. 1, 2, 21, 34, 43, 59, 87, 88, 97, 98, 116, 118, 123, 125, 126, 127, 134, 141, 144, 155, 161.

list.item: II. Nine dot red and black asterisk; Four dot asterisk.
III. Chain of black and red dots; ornamental band (9ra)

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards (the back board is missing and replaced by a piece of cardboard), previously covered with leather (remains are preserved on the inner side of the front board). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Small holes or tears are visible on the spine folds of the quires, close to the head and tail of the codex.

origin.origDate: Quires III-XXI: first half of the 16th cent.(before 1540). King Lǝbna Dǝngǝl (r. 1508-1540) is mentioned on 16rb. Quires I and II: late 18th or early 19th cent. (?)

history.provenance: According to Additio 1, ʾabeto Č̣ammār has donated the Ms. His name (also called Zawalda Māryām Č̣ammār) and that of ʾabuna Takla Hāymānot are written in the supplication formulas on 9rab (hand a). Walda Śǝllāse is mentioned in the supplication formula on 9va in hand b. The names of ʿĀmdā Yoḥannǝs and Sabla Wangel are stated in the supplication formula in 15vb (hand c).

msContents.summary:
I) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 4ra-9rb) I-1) Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymn (fols. 4ra-9rb)
II) Taʾammǝra Libānos: 3 miracles (fols. 9va-10rb)

msItem.title: Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt – Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah
msItem.incipit: 4ra, l. 1 በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአምር፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ እምቅድመ፡ ያንብቡ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ዘወጽአ፡ እምንበረ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ እመካነ፡ መዓልቃ፡ ዘምስር፡ ዘአንበሩ፡ መምህራን፡ መጋብያነ፡ ምሥጢር፡ ርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት።In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, One God. This book of miracles that is read before the Miracles of Our Lady Mary. This book of rules that came from the seat of Mark the Apostle, from the church of Mäʿalqa (al-Muʿallaqah) of Mǝsr (i.e. Cairo), which the doctors, glorious patriarchs, treasurers of the mystery, the righteous had laid up (there).
msItem.explicit: 9ra, l. 21ንስግድ፡ ለኪ፡ ለሰይትነበብ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአምርኪ፡ በሰላም፡ ኪያነ፡ ባ ርኪ፨

msItem.title: Salām laki ḫoḫǝta mǝśrāq ... "Salutation to you, Threshold of the East ..."
msItem.incipit: 9ra, l.12 ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ኆኀተ፡ ምሥራቅ፡ ዘወልደ፡ ኖሬ፨ I greet you, the threshold of the East, who brightest forth the Light.

msItem.title: Taʾammǝra Libānos “Miracles of Libānos”, 3 miracles
msItem.incipit: 9vaተአምሪሁ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ አባ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበራከቱ፡ የሃሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብሩ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። ወሀሎ፡ ፩ብእሲ፡ ዘየብሰት፡ እዴሁ፡ ወበጽሐ፡ ኀበ፡ መካኑ፡ ለቅዱስ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ወተሳለመ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያኑ፨The miracles of the blessed ʾabbā Libānos, may his prayer and blessing be with his servant Kidāna Māryām, for eternity. Amen. There was one man whose hand became crippled, and he came to the place of the saint Libānos, and he greeted his church.
msItem.explicit: 10rb, l.17 ወአንከሩ፡ ተአምሪሁ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ደቂቀ፡ ዛቲ፡ መቅደስ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ And they were amazed by the miracles of the blessed Libānos. May his prayer and blessing be with all of us, the children of this sanctuary, for eternity. Amen.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

item.q: 3va, ls.1-13 ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘአቤቶ፡ ጨማር፡ ዘወኃባ፡ ለደብረ፡ መስቀል፡ ከመ፡ ትኩኖ፡ መርሐ፡ ለመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፨ በፈቃደ፡ መምህሩ፡ አቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ትክድኖሙ፡ ለክልኤሆሙ፡ እምገጸ፡ ሞት፨ ወዕምውዑይ፡ ገሀነመ፡ እሰት፨ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወኢትርሰዕዋ፡ ፩አቡነ፡ ዘበማያት[sic]፡ በጊዜ፡ ጸሎት፡ ወዕጣን፡ ወበጊዜ፡ ቁርባን፡
item.note: The note, written in hand a, states that the Ms. was donated by ʾabeto Č̣ammār to Dabra Masqal, in the time when the church head was ʾabuna Takla Hāymānot.

msContents.summary: I) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary" (11ra-15v) I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 11ra-13rb) I-3) ʾƎsaggǝd laki wa-ʾǝweddǝsaki... "I worship Thee..." (fols. 13rb-14rb) I-4a) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary": 1 miracle (fols. 14rb-15vb)

msItem.title: Introductory exhortation and hymns
msItem.incipit: 11ra, l.1: መቅድመ፡ ተአምር፡ ዘሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ቅዱስት፡== ንነግረክሙ፡ አኃዊነ፡ ፍቁራን፡ ውሉደ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይባርክሙ፡ ወያብርህ፡ አዕይንተ፡ አልባቢክሙ፨ ለሰሚዓ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም።First, miracle for the Christian holy Sunday. We will tell you, our brothers, children of the church, may God bless you and enlighten the eyes of your hearts to hear the miracles of our Lady Mary, the holy and twofold Virgin.
msItem.explicit: 13rb, l. 9 ቅዱሳን፡ ወኅሩያን፡ ወንጹሓን፡ ድንግልናኪ፡ አለ፡ ይሴብሑ፨ ኀበ፡ ሥዕልኪ፡ እንዘ፡ ይጸርሑ፡ ብርሃነ፡ ጸጋኪ፡ ይትሞጥሑ፡ ኀበ፡ ቤተ፡ መርዓሁ፡ ለወልድኪ፡ ያንፈርዕፁ፡ ወይትሥሑ፨ አሜን፨

msItem.title: ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝya qǝddǝst dǝngǝl ba-kǝlʾe Māryām ṣalotǝki wa-barakatǝki
ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝya qǝddǝst dǝngǝl ba-kǝlʾe Māryām ʾǝmmu la-ʾǝgziʾǝna la-ʾIyasus Krǝstos
salām laki ʾo-ʾǝgzǝʾǝtya Māryām ʾǝmmu la-bǝrhān
ʾƎsaggǝd laki wa-ʾǝweddǝsaki “I Worship Thee...”
msItem.incipit: 13rb, l. 15 እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ ወእዌድሰኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፨ ለመርዓዊ፡ ሰማያዊ፡ ጽርሑ፨ በከመ፡ ወደሰኪ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ በመኃልይሁ
msItem.explicit: 14rb, l. 5 ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ሰአሊ፡ ወጸልዪ፡ ኀበ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልድኪ፡ ከመ፡ ይስረይ፡ ለነ፡ ኃጣውኢነ፡ አሜን፨

msItem.title: Taʾammǝra Māryām: 1 miracle
msItem.incipit: 14ra, l.8 (Miracle 1)ተአምረሃ፡ ለእግዚእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ በረከተ፡ ጸሎታ፡ ወኃይለ፡ ረድኤታ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ገብራ፡ ምኀፅንተ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ስምዑ፡ አበዊነ፡ ወአኃዊነ፡ በእዝነ፡ ልብ፡ መንፈሳዊ፡ ከመ፡ ንንግር{ክሙ}፡ ዘንተ፡ ተአምረ፡ ዓቢየ፡ ዘነገሩነ፡ አበዊነ፡ ቅዱሳን፡… ወይቤሉ ነበረ፡ ብእሲ፡ ለብሐዊ፡ ዘስሙ፡ ኤፍሬም፡…
msItem.note: Miracle 1 is included in quire I added in the late 18th or early 19th century (the scribe used compressed script, to accommodate the text on the rest free space of the folio). The original collection starts on f. 16r

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handDesc.handNote: 11r-15v late 18th or early 19th cent Hand c: fine: slender, slightly right-sloping letters. Black; red. Maḫḍǝnta Māryām is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication formula on 15vb. Holy names; incipit of Text II; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.

list.item: - Crude poetic notes in pen: 11v (composition for Libānos?).

msItem.title: Taʾammǝra Māryām: 102 miracles
msItem.incipit: 16ra በስመ፡”…ንቅድም፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወበስነ፡ ሀብቱ፡ በጽሐፈተ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዚእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ንጽሕት፡ ማሪያም፡ ማሪሃም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፨ …ጸሎታ፡ ወበረከታ፡ ወትንብልናሃ፡ ወምሕረተ፡ ወልዳ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ምስለ፡ ንጉሥነ፡ ልብነ፡ ድንግል፡…ተብህለ፡ ከመ፡ ሀሎ፡ ውስተ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘሃገረ፡ ጦላይጥልያ፨
msItem.note: The miracles of Text I-4b are numbered.

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. is very worn. Many fols. are stained with wax and dirt. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 29, 41, 49, 58, 91, 100, 107, 125, 132, 133, 134, 141, 154, 155, 156. Holes on fols. 1, 2, 21, 34, 43, 59, 87, 88, 97, 98, 116, 118, 123, 125, 126, 127, 134, 141, 144, 155, 161.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling (below the ruling e.g., 112r-116v).
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

item.desc: The reading for the month Naḥāse is indicated in the upper margin, in a secondary hand: በወርኀ፡ ነሐሴ፡ አመ፡ ፲ወ፯፡ አመ፡ ፳፩:

origin.origDate: Quires III-XXI: first half of the 16th cent.(before 1540). King Lǝbna Dǝngǝl (r. 1508-1540) is mentioned on 16rb.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
started adjusting, no person IDs created

div.ab:
ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ኆኅተ፡ ምሥ
ራቅ፡ ዘወልደ፡ ኖሬ፡ ሰላም
ለኪ፡ ዓፀድ፡ ዘእስከደሬ፡
ለሶኪ፡ ስርጉት፡ በወሪ
ውሬ፡ ሰለኪ፡ ፅድልት፡
ንጸሬ፡ ሰላኪ፡ በትረ፡ እ
ሮን፡ ጸዋሪተ፡ ፍሬ፡ ሶላ
ኪ፡ እንተ፡ ወለድኪ፡ ፈ
ጣሬ፡ ዘምስለ፡ ዝማረ፡
ንስጣድ፡ ለኪ፡ ለስይትን
በብ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአም
ርኪ፡ በሰላም፡ ኪያነ፡ ባ
ርኪ። ወኢትርስእኒ፡ ለ
ገብርኪ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ወአባሴ፡
ዘወልደ፡ ማርያሞ፡
ማር፡ አቡነ፡ ትክለ፡ ሃይማ
ሮት፡ ወልደሙ፡ ለአቡን፡
ዘገብርኤል፡ ለዓለመ፡ ን
ለም፡ አሜን፡ ወአሜን፡
